title: Karan Oberoi opens up about his break up with Mona Singh
body_text:
Karan Oberoi opens up about his break up with Mona Singh
Actor and singer Karan Oberoi was once in a relationship with Mona Singh when the two worked together on the TV show Jassi Jaisi Koi Nahin. In a recent interview, Karan opened up about his break up with Mona and how she ended the relationship even though he wanted to marry her.
